snippet: Doctors are not flocking to treat the aging population, especially because of low Medicare reimbursements, leading to projections of severe shortages of health care professionals.
abstract: Doctors are increasingly reluctant to treat the aging population, causing concern among health experts who say they expect severe shortages of health care professionals for retirees and the elderly.
lead_paragraph: Doctors are not flocking to treat the aging population, especially because of low Medicare reimbursements, leading to projections of severe shortages of health care professionals.

headline.seo: Needed: Health Providers to Treat the Aging
headline.main: Needed: Health Professionals to Treat the Aging
headline.print_headline: Wanted: Health Professionals To Treat the Aging
